subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Frank's Box #94 Youtube Video
author: Tim Woolworth
full_text:
Interesting.

Do you speak French Steve?  A woman was speaking it during the clip starting
at .41 seconds.  Are there any French radio stations down that way?  What I
find interesting is that she is speaking French and man is agreeing with her
in English.  It may be radio broadcast because of the clarity, but I would
think a translator would be speaking for her since only the Bayou and Quebec
use French here in North America.

My French is really rusty, but I think she is saying:

"D'accord.  En vous etait parlons a l'etre (yes)  te t'aller...." and I
can't quite make out the rest.

"I agree.  What you are talking about is the being (yes).  You go...."

When you switch to direct mode random at 4:13 you get a pretty clear female
"hey."

Looks like the camera was well worth the money!

Tim
